modName: Complete mods list for Hardcore experience
summary:
A complete mod list for a new Skyrim with a 100% working together mods. A new experience, more realistic, more difficult, and more fun.
More danger, more glory.
descriptionHtml:
Hello.

In first time, sry for my english, it isn't my first language. I will try my best.

[b][u][color=#93c47d][size=5]Description : [/size][/color][/u][/b]

A lot of people is modding Skyrim for a new experience, but many problems come : bugs, crashes, freezes... After many hours, I have succed to do a list of mod fun, immersive, lore friendly and without incompatibility problems. So, I do this "mod" to help new players who's modding.

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]Caracteristic :[/size][/color][/b]

- More difficult;
- More Realistic;
- Longer (very longer);
- More beautiful;
- Easier to used;
- less bugged.

[color=#cc4125][size=4]-> [b]More difficult :[/b][/size][/color]

My mod list is based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul[/url], a big Overhaul which do a new Skyrim, more realistic. And, this realism is more difficult than the overpowered dragonborn of the Vanilla Skyrim.

A dragon is a dragon, a draugr is a draugr, and a sabre cat is a sabre cat.

Requiem rebalance all of the ennemies in Skyrim, to a new experience, more realistic and more fun.

Requiem change perk ans skill system too.

[color=#cc4125][size=4]-> [b]More realistic :[/b][/size][/color]

In Vanilla Skyrim, a lot of thing are doing metagame, or let you be overpowered without reason. When you can kill a draugr without training, or when you can buy 4 houses, be thanes on 2 enemies cities and control dark brotherood and the thieves guild, it's not realistic. 

With this list, you will must choose your side, prepare your dungeons, throw something to carry something else... You won't can take 3 swords, 2 heavy armors and 4 warhammer and continue to run. You will not win life after a injuries without heal you...

All of that thing make the game more realistic, and better. 

[color=#cc4125][size=4]-> [b]Longer :[/b][/size][/color]

A game more difficult is longer. And a player who have challenge will continue to play. And some quest are upload too.

[color=#cc4125][size=4]-> [b]More beautiful :[/b][/size][/color]

New textures, new animation, new light and shadow, new weather.... A new world for a new experience.

[color=#cc4125][size=4]-> [b]Easier to used and Less bugged: [/b][/size][/color]

Many littles mods are used to help player and stop little Vanilla bug.

[color=#93c47d][size=5]- [b][u]Download :[/u] [/b][/size][/color]

Of course, you maybe not wan't all the mods of the list. But, be carefull. This list is working with all the mods. Be safe if you used just a part of them.

To help you, I will do many list classed by kind (gameplay, graphic etc...). At the end you can see the load order I use.

[color=#93c47d][size=5]- [b][u]Mods list :[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#93c47d][size=5]- [b][u]Load Order :[/u][/b][/size][/color]

I upload here my own load order. I will try to make it easy to read and understand :
